entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor JS interop: Provide a way to better control the JSON.stringify() process #37312
  • HTTP/3: Consider adding libmsquic to mcr.microsoft.com/dotnet/aspnet #37311
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [Blazor] Bundling all resources into a single file #37310
  • Startup regression: multiple_queries #37300
  • Perf improvement: caching, fortunes, mvc #37299
  • DefaultHealthCheckService should use CreateAsyncScope() #37296
  • Blazor issue with generics ? #37295
  • Document pattern for prerendering head section #37293
    6.0.0
  • Update Microsoft.Signed.WiX to 1.0.0-v3.14.0.5722 #37290
  • Modify controller action code, click hot reload, ViewBag properties become inaccessible #37288
  • ReactRedux project template npm install EJSONPARSE failure #37287
  • Rename EndpointMiddleware to EndpointExecutionMiddleware #37284
    Backlog
  • Inconsistent bool to string conversion #37283
  • Suggestion: Use Razor template engine outside of MVC #37282
  • Drawn controls support for Blazor #37281
    Backlog
  • Webserver tries to serve /_framework5.0.xx.js and throws exception in a loop #37278
  • Startup regression: fortunes, json #37276

Closed

  • WebApplication does not react to appsettings.json changes #37046
    6.0.0
  • [Bug] Memory stream is closed inside WebApplicationBuilder and MauiAppBuilder while configuring the host configuration. #37030
    6.0.0
  • HTTP/3 end-to-end signoff for .NET 6 #35531
    6.0.0
  • Reading form with invalid content throws NullReferenceException #36987
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [Kestrel] Using Expect: 100-continue header in a request doesn't produce expected results #37126
  • Accepting HTTP Requests In Worker Service #37195
  • HeadOutlet not working when using WebAssembly and Serverside Pre Render. #37254
  • Startup improvement: caching, json #36975
  • [Blazor] TypeError: Failed to Fetch in Android Chrome Incognito Mode #37286
  • Blazor wasm: unable to reference enums in razor page and namespace not visible #37218
  • can you add a new component to body/div in Blazor ? #37253
  • Using FromRouteAttribute's Name property with minimal routes is broken #37268
    6.0.0
  • VS 2022 : Compiler detection errors #37277
  • Single file build time regression: json #37211
  • Perf regression: json_nodejs, plaintext_nodejs #37210
  • Razor Component: 2 comments in a row, crashes VS2019 #15160
  • Blazor Component called "Script" produces intellisense errors and fails to compile correctly #24159
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio warning about razor component closing tag #18685
    Razor.Tooling
  • Blazor using high CPU running background tasks that never finish #20731
    Razor.Tooling
  • Blazor page error takes much longer time to show up #12845
    Backlog
  • Razor expression statement completion disappears when typing quickly in Visual Studio #9137
    Backlog
  • MissingManifestResourceException forces you to Stop running. #9065
    Backlog
  • Respect `EndpointGroupName` attributes in MVC ApiExplorer #35055
    Backlog
  • Namespace names are always grayed out in _ViewImports.cshtml #5009
    Razor.Tooling
  • TagHelper Insert Text Doesn't Work Appropriately When Re-Querying Completion #22261
    Razor.Tooling
  • rename enum ignores cshtml files #20732
    Razor.Tooling
  • FindFirstValue(ClaimTypes.Email) returns null #34937
    Discussions

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump url-parse from 1.5.1 to 1.5.3 in /src/SignalR/clients/ts/signalr #37313
    area-signalr, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, javascript
  • Unquarantine BlazorWasmHostedTemplate_AzureActiveDirectoryTemplate_Works #37309
    area-mvc
  • Health checks can use dependencies that implement IAsyncDisposable only #37297
    community-contribution
  • Merge bootstrap4 sxs support from release/6.0 #37294
    area-identity
  • [release/6.0] Set aria-current for manage pages #37274
    Servicing-approved, area-identity

Merged

  • Load IConfigurationProviders once in WebApplicationBuilder #37039
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Don't allow modifying WebRootPath after initialization #37147
    Servicing-approved, area-web-frameworks, 6.0.0
  • Fix form key accumulator #37272
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/3.1] Clear layout directories before copies #37208
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.21
  • [release/6.0] Load IConfigurationProviders once in WebApplicationBuilder #37040
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.0
  • Update build.gradle #36478
    area-signalr, tell-mode, 5.0.12
  • Revert "[release/5.0] Disable OSX10.14 Helix jobs for now" #36564
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.12
  • [release/5.0] Make `deactivate` clean x86 root #36758
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.12
  • [release/5.0] Create .rpm's for Linux Mariner #36894
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.12
  • [release/5.0] Use new Hosted build pools #37162
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.12
  • [release/5.0] Don't clear NuGet caches at all #37163
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.12
  • [release/5.0] Clear layout directories before copies #37165
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.12
  • [release/5.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `955c7f8` to `3b49be0` #37175
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.12
  • Update branding for 3.1.21 #37291
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.21
  • [release/3.1] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `955c7f8` to `3b49be0` #37176
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.21
  • [release/3.1] Use new Hosted build pools #37161
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.21
  • [release/3.1] Create .rpm's for Linux Mariner #36895
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.21
  • [release/3.1] Include SharedFx bundle in Hosting Bundle, instead of SharedFx .msi #36891
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.21
  • [release/3.1] Make `deactivate` clean x86 root #36757
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.21
  • Update branding for 5.0.12 #37292
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.12
  • [release/6.0] Fix virtualization handling of large dataset length changes. Fixes #37245 #37250
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Release JS Blob after BrowserFileStream is disposed. Fixes #35540 #37248
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Honor FromRoute parameter name when specified #37273
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks, 6.0.0
  • Fixed typo in StackTraceHelper.cs #37280
    community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Honor FromRoute parameter name when specified #37271
    feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview1
  • Update GitHub Issue Templates #37267
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Apply Linter & Update Yarn for `src/Components/Web.JS` #37203
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Support EndpointGroupName metadata in MVC ApiExplorer #37264
    feature-openapi, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview1
  • [Accessiblity] Set aria-current for manage nav #37110
    area-identity, 7.0-preview1
  • Update Selenium dependencies #37183
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Use one-shot HMACSHA1.HashData() for Identity TOTP values #36724
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • Remove trace interfaces from Kestrel transports #37243
    area-runtime
  • Remove IKestrelTrace #37242
    area-runtime
  • Use F# task ce in worker template #36986
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Update gRPC template reference to Grpc.AspNetCore #37229
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-grpc, 6.0.0
  • Try out helix retry #37137
    area-infrastructure
  • Update gRPC template reference to Grpc.AspNetCore #37168
    area-infrastructure, area-grpc
  • Update build.gradle #36477
    area-signalr, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • Update SDK to 7.0.100-alpha.1.21480.20 #37192
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/2.1] Use new Hosted build pools #37159
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Added nullable overload for markupString #37265
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Try test on CI #37270
    area-runtime
